name: Dmitry Smetanin I: The Beginning
description: Dmitry Smetanin was born relatively recently: just about 14 years ago. But he has a mind... If we rate Smetanin's mind on a 100-point scale, he will get a score of 0.001. That’s it! In this adventure game you will play as this not quite normal boy, to put it mildly.
